meanings.definition: A person who knows or has knowledge.
meanings.sent1: The knowers in the library were reading books.
meanings.sent2: The knowers shared their knowledge with others.
meanings.sent3: The knowers had a contest to see who knew the most facts.
meanings.sent4: She was a true knower of the stars, able to identify constellations effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The group of knowers formed a circle to discuss their findings.

meanings.definition: Those who possess knowledge or understanding.
meanings.sent1: The knowers in the classroom raised their hands to answer questions.
meanings.sent2: The knowers were sought after for their expertise in various subjects.
meanings.sent3: The knowers organized a trivia night to showcase their intelligence.
meanings.sent4: He was a knower of ancient languages, deciphering texts with ease.
meanings.sent5: The knowers gathered around the table to share their insights.
